title: Life of Jane Welsh Carlyle,
author: Ireland, Annie Elizabeth (Nicholson)
snippet: Carlyle's letter to his mother — Mrs. Carlyle's overstrained nerves and sailing strength — Her letter to Eliza Stodart — Mrs. Welsh's delicate,' health — Death of Walter Welsh of Templand — The Carlyles  plan a long visit to Edinburgh — The home at r8 Carlton Street, Stockbridge — The ' disgraceful home march ' — An angel's visit at Craigenputtock — Meeting of Emerson and the Carlyles — The relapse into solitude — Living in London seriously contemplated  — Preparations.
